###############
Command Line UI
###############

.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   glab
   edit-glimpse-params
   glimpse-cluster

The Glimpse command-line interface is composed of three programs.

:ref:`glab <command-glab>`
   Run Glimpse experiments.
:ref:`edit-glimpse-params <command-edit-glimpse-params>`
   Customize model parameters using a GUI.
:ref:`glimpse-cluster <command-glimpse-cluster>`
   Launch worker nodes on a compute cluster and check thier status.
